metadata.title: CVE-2018-5107 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The printing process can bypass local access protections to read filesavailable through symlinks, bypassing local file restrictions. The printingprocess requires files in a specific format so arbitrary data cannot beread but it is possible that some local file information could be exposed.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 58.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
